comments:
Servlet wizard fails to launch if there are no projects in the workspace

Build ID: WTP 201

Steps To Reproduce:
Exception in log

patch that fixes that problem
Committed to HEAD in CVS (but I removed the modified String constant that was from 200433 - see that bug for details.)
